description:
Mokoyama has returned a changed man. Though he doesn’t wish to assist Yukino or Mr. Kirisaki in any way, he desperately wants to prove his worth by displaying his new form, Panda Man, and his new weapon, Super Baking Powder!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoufu no Revenge!! Panda Otoko, Arawaru!
Ultime revanche ! Le retour de l`homme-panda !
การแก้แค้นอันน่ากลัว มนุษย์แพนด้ามาแล้ว
恐怖のリベンジ!! パンダ男, 現る!
